title: Handle an ADA Accommodation Request
description: An employee requests an ergonomic chair as a reasonable accommodation under the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA).

tasks.description: Receive the accommodation request and begin the interactive process with the employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR representative acknowledges the request and explains the process.

tasks.description: Request medical documentation to understand the employee's limitations.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR requests and receives a doctor's note supporting the need for an ergonomic chair.

tasks.description: Approve the request and coordinate with facilities to procure and deliver the ergonomic chair.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR approves the accommodation and creates a work order for facilities.
